content: A metal sphere is connected to the ground. A plastic rod with a net positive charge is brought near it without quite touching it. The ground connection is then removed, while keeping the rod in place. Finally, the rod is removed. The best description of what happens is that
choices: The sphere has a negative net charge
The sphere has zero net charge and every part of its surface is neutral
The sphere has zero net charge but induced charges are on the surface with the negative induced charge closest to the rod
The sphere has zero net charge but induced charges are on the surface with the positive induced charge closest to the rod
The sphere has a positive net charge
tips: Remember charging can happen by induction and conduction.
